name: finalLayoutAttributesForDisappearingSupplementaryElement(ofKind:at:)
desc: Retrieves the final layout information for a supplementary view that is about to be removed from the collection view.
declaration:
func finalLayoutAttributesForDisappearingSupplementaryElement(ofKind elementKind: String, 
                                                           at elementIndexPath: IndexPath) -> UICollectionViewLayoutAttributes?
